DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the response rate of patients with non small lung cancer to gemcitabine in combination with radiotherapy. The tolerability and safety of this combination will also be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Phase 2 Trial Evaluating Cisplatin-Gemcitabine With Concomitant Thoracic Radiotherapy for Treatment of Inoperable Stage III Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inoperable non small cell lung cancer Stage III Adequate hematological parameters Adequate Lung function reserve Previous chemotherapy and thoracic radiation for non small cell lung cancer Presence of distant metastases
